gp A 1st: 
first: 172.31.0.0/22 ==> 10101100 00011111 0000  00  00 00000000
last: 172.31.0.0/22 ==> 10101100 00011111 0000  00  11 11111111

gp A 4th: 
first: 172.31.0.0/22 ==> 10101100 00011111 0000  11  00 00000000
last: 172.31.15.255/22 ==> 10101100 00011111 0000  11  11 11111111

ip: 10101100 00011111 /00000000 00000000

gp A : 4 com ==> 1000 host < 2^10
com 0
first: 10101100 00011111 /0000/00/{00 00000000} => 0
last: 10101100 00011111 /0000/00/{11 11111111} => 1023 total: 1024
---

first: 10101100 00011111 /0000/01/{00 00000000} => 0
last: 10101100 00011111 /0000/01/{11 11111111} => 1023
